title: The Brave Little Girl
story: She goes out to play. She runs around. She falls down. It hurts. She cries. She gets up. She goes to the nurse. The nurse is nice. She looks friendly. The nurse gives her a lollipop. It tastes good. The nurse gives her a bandage. She is okay now. She walks back to class.
summary: A brave little girl overcomes a minor injury with the help of a kind nurse, teaching resilience and the importance of seeking support.
image: An illustration of a little girl playing outside and a smiling nurse offering her a lollipop and a bandage.
